choices.E: Add http://autologon.microsoftazuread-sso.com to the intranet zone of each client computer in the Miami office.

choices.A: Allow inbound TCP port 8080 to the domain controllers in the Miami office

questions.answer_description:
B: Seamless SSO works with any method of cloud authentication - Password Hash Synchronization or Pass-through Authentication, and can be enabled via Azure
